decline:
Dear {{ preprint.owner.full_name }},

Unfortunately we have decided not to publish your {{ request.repository.object_name }}.

The moderator provided the following note:

{{preprint.preprint_decline_note}}

Regards,

{{ request.repository.name }} Team
{{ request.repository.site_url }}
publication:
Dear {{ preprint.owner.full_name }},

Your preprint has been published on {{ request.repository.name }}. It is now available on our website.

Regards,

{{ request.repository.name }} Team
{{ request.repository.site_url }}
submission:
Dear {{ preprint.owner.full_name }},

Thank you for your {{ request.repository.object_name }} submission titled {{ preprint.title }}. An Editor will review it before making a decision.

Regards,

{{ request.repository.name }} Team
{{ request.repository.site_url }}
accept_version:
Dear {{ pending_update.preprint.owner.full_name }},

Thank you for uploading a new version of {{ pending_update.preprint.title }}. This has been approved and is now live.

{{ request.repository.name }} Team
{{ request.repository.site_url }}
decline_version:
Dear {{ pending_update.preprint.owner.full_name }},

Thank you for uploading a new version of {{ pending_update.preprint.title }}. This update has been declined, the reason is provided below.

{{ reason|safe }}

{{ request.repository.name }} Team
{{ request.repository.site_url }}
new_comment:
Dear {{ preprint.owner.full_name }},

A comment has been made on your article '{title}', you can moderate comments on the journal site.

{{ request.repository.name }} Team
{{ request.repository.site_url }}
review_invitation:
Dear {{ review.reviewer.full_name }},

I hope this message finds you well. We would like to invite you to comment on a {{ request.repository.object_name }} titled {{ review.preprint.title }} submitted to {{ request.repository.name }}. We would be most grateful for your time and feedback.

{{ url }}

{{ request.user.signature }}
{{ request.repository.site_url }}
review_helper: Add your comments below. These will be displayed publicly once approved. You can mark your comments as anonymous if you do not want to display your name alongside the comments.
manager_review_status_change:
Dear {{ review.manager.full_name }},

The Review invitation you initiated for "{{ review.preprint.title }}" has been updated.

{{ status_text }}

You can view the review here: {{url}}

{{ request.repository.name }} Team
reviewer_review_status_change:
Dear {{ review.reviewer.full_name }},

I hope this message finds you well. I am writing to inform you that the invitation we sent to ask that you add a review comment to "{{ review.preprint.title }}" has been withdrawn. The following reason has been given:

{{ review.status_reason|linebreaksbr }}

{{ request.user.signature|safe }}
{{ request.repository.site_url }}
